akn:section.akn:heading: Exclusive right to name, seals, emblems, and badges

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 170105. Exclusive right to name, seals, emblems, and badges The corporation and its State and regional organizations and local chapters or posts have the exclusive right to use the name “Paralyzed Veterans of America” and seals, emblems, and badges the corporation lawfully adopts. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1441.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
17010536:1160.Aug. 11, 1971, Pub. L. 92–93, § 10, 85 Stat. 318.
The words “sole”, “have and”, and “in carrying out its purposes” are omitted as unnecessary.
